questions.question_text: To enable policy-based routing, which function specifies the match criteria and resulting action of all the match clauses that are met?

choices.A: R2 will advertise network 192.168.2.0/27 with a hop count of 16 to R1.
choices.E: R3 will not accept any further updates from R2, due to the split-horizon loop prevention mechanism. AC
choices.B: R2 will not send any advertisements and will remove route 192.168.2.0/27 from its routing table.
choices.D: After communication fails and after the hold-down timer expires, R1 will remove the 192.168.2.0/27 route from its routing table.
choices.C: R1 will reply to R2 with the advertisement for network 192.168.2.0/27 with a hop count of 16.

questions.question_text:
Refer to the exhibit. The network setup is running the RIP routing protocol. Which two events will occur following link failure between R2 and R3? (Choose two.)
//IMG//

discussion.content:
D is correct

When there are multiple sources for the same route and the shared services segment is multiple hops away from the router doing route replication, the routing table uses the following preference rules to choose the route for installation:

1. Prefers a route with a better IGP administrative distance
2. Prefers a route with a better default administrative distance
3. Prefers a nonreplicated route over a replicated route
4. Prefers a replicated route with a better replicate distance
5. Prefers a replicated route with a better lexical value of the source VRF name

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collateral/ios-nx-os-software/layer-3-vpns-l3vpn/whitepaper_c11-638769.html
default administrative distance of the route

choices.B: lexical value of the source VRF name
choices.D: IGP administrative distance of the route
choices.E: default administrative distance of the route D

questions.question_text: A router in an EVN environment is choosing a route. Which value is given the highest selection priority?
What is the range for private AS numbers?

choices.B: The 209.165.201.0/27 subnet is assigned as the outside local address range
choices.E: The 10.1.1.0/27 subnet is assigned as the inside global address range
choices.A: The 10.1.1.0/27 subnet is assigned as the inside local addresses
choices.D: It establishes a one-to-one NAT translation
choices.C: Inside source addresses are translated to the 209.165.201.0/27 subnet
